description:
The anime's story is set on Naral Island, a continent with swords and magic in which humans and monsters coexist. The terrible Demon King lives there. In ancient times, the first-generation hero defeated the Demon King. Over the many successive generations since then, the Demon King has been resurrected, and the hero who opposes him has likewise reappeared. Girls attend a school for adventurers in order to defeat the Demon King when he appears again.

Though a bit absent-minded, Yusha has the body of a hero. The holy elf Seyla's trouble never ends because she is too serious. The cheerful warrior Fai loves to eat. Mei is a quiet otaku magician. As the four girls aim to be in the hero party, they live relaxed fantasy lives and show no sign of defeating the Demon King no matter how much time passes.

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Ojou-sama
tags.description: Features a wealthy, high-class, oftentimes stuck up and demanding female character.

tags.name: Elf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

tags.name: Primarily Child Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters below a high school age.

tags.name: Teacher
tags.description: Protagonist is an educator, usually in a school setting.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Yuri
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two females, not inherently sexual. Also known as Girls' Love.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Card Battle
tags.description: Centers around individuals competing in card games.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Memory Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) who has had their memories altered.

node.description:
__Birthplace:__ Takaoka, Toyama Prefecture, Japan
__Residence:__ Kyoto, Kyoto Prefecture, Japan

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/_namori_/) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/124923) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/namoridane/)

Namori is a manga artist, best known for the manga [Yuru Yuri](https://anilist.co/manga/41593/Yuru-Yuri). She started attending painting classes around the age of 3 and she likes to work on her manga in coffee shops and other places outside. 

When she went to school, one of her classmates wrote "na" (the Hiragana "な") in a cute way, and Namori wanted to write it as well, hence her pen name starts with "na". The "mori" part does not stem from anywhere in particular.

__Height:__ 154 cm 
__Agency:__ AXL-ONE

__[Website](https://inoriminase.com)__ | __[Profile (AXL-ONE)](http://axl-one.com/talent/minase.html)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/inoriminase)__ | __[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/inoriminase_info/)__ | __[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYBwKaLwCGY7k3auR_FLanA)__

A Japanese voice actress and singer-songwriter under entertainment agency Axlone (2017–) and record label King Records (2015–), having previously been under entertainment agency Sony Music Entertainment (2010–2017). She has been active as a voice actor since 2010, debuting in the anime Occult Academy voicing the character Akari Okamoto, while debuting as a singer-songwriter in December 2015.

Inori was born in Tokyo, where she began watching anime in kindergarten. She first became aware of voice acting when, after watching a stage play adaption of an anime, she read the stage pamphlet and asked her parents about a person mentioned in it. She found out that she wanted to become a voice actor at the age of six, and at elementary school she listed voice acting as her desired future career. 

In middle school, Inori joined her school's tennis and theater clubs, however, she quit the theater club due to feeling too embarrassed when appearing on stage. Around the same time, her mother found a magazine advertising for a voice-acting audition, which she participated in and won.

(Source: Wikipedia, edited)

**Non-anime roles:**
- Iris - Memento Mori (VG)
- Soline - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Furina - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Balloon Party - Reverse: 1999 (VG)

__Height:__ 152 cm (5' 0")
__Agency:__ I'm Enterprise

[Profile (I'm Enterprise)](https://www.imenterprise.jp/profile.php?id=31) | [Official Blog](https://ameblo.jp/ari-step/) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ari_Ozawa) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%B0%8F%E6%BE%A4%E4%BA%9C%E6%9D%8E)

On August 10th, 2020, she announced her marriage to musician [Hige Driver](https://anilist.co/staff/142137).

__Agency:__ I'm Enterprise

Freelancer. Recognizable for his bassy and often reverbed sound effects.

Regularly works with [Yoshikazu Iwanami](https://anilist.co/staff/101016/) and [Jin Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/103074/).
